meanings.definition: relating to or having the form of an ellipse
meanings.sent1: The elliptical shape of the moon fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The artist drew an elliptical circle on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The elliptical orbit of the spaceship made it look like a giant hula hoop in space.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed an elliptical path, circling back to the same ideas.
meanings.sent5: The elliptical design of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: using or involving ellipsis, especially so as to be difficult to understand
meanings.sent1: The professor's elliptical explanation left the students confused.
meanings.sent2: The elliptical speech was full of hidden meanings.
meanings.sent3: The detective's elliptical clues led to a surprising twist in the case.
meanings.sent4: Her elliptical writing style left readers pondering the deeper message.
meanings.sent5: The politician's elliptical answers avoided direct responses to the questions.
